personal.firstnameMin: First name should have a minimum of 2 symbols
personal.firstnameMax: First name should have a maximum of 256 symbols
personal.lastnameMin: Last name name should have a minimum of 2 symbols
personal.lastnameMax: Last name should have a maximum of 256 symbols
personal.emailPattern: Check your email please. Example: my-email@example.com
personal.phoneRequired: Fill the mobile phone number please!

password.minSymbols: Password length must be at least 8 characters
password.maxSymbols: Password length must not exceed 16 characters
password.cyrillic: You can use only Latin letters
password.samePassword: The new password should not match the current one!
password.newPasswordPattern: Password should include at least one uppercase, one lowercase and one number
